urlText: Lift at Martin Place Station not available between the station concourse, gallery level and Martin Place.
content:
The lift between the station concourse, gallery level and Martin Place is temporarily out of service.

If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9379 4858.
subtitle: Lift at Martin Place Station not available between the station concourse, gallery level and Martin Place.
